messages.title: Delivering for Eastleigh
messages.content: Chris Huhne has a record of action and success for people in Eastleigh. Whether it is fighting against 6,000 extra homes near Botley or demanding Government action on excessive motorway noise, Chris is standing up for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris wants to help protect our amenities from closure including many local pubs and post offices.
Chris Huhne's tax plan means you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour are out of the race here. Only Chris Huhne's Lib Dems can beat the Conservative candidate and bring change that works for you.

issues.education: Chris is campaigning for smaller class sizes in our schools.
issues.environment: Chris is leading the fight against excessive house building on green fields near Hedge End and Botley.

housing.content: Chris is leading the fight against excessive house building on green fields near Hedge End and Botley.

images.caption: Chris Huhne working hard for you.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Three things to remember... 1. Local Champion - Everyone knows someone who has been helped by Chris Huhne. 2. Fair taxes - Pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700. 3. Labour cannot win here - Labour cannot win this time, and only the Lib Dems will change the country.
